name: google-calendar-api
description: Interact with the Google Calendar API to list, create, update, delete, and search calendar events, as well as list available calendars. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: google_calendar_api
toolDefinition.description: Interact with Google Calendar to list, create, update, delete, and search events, and list available calendars. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access (BYOK).

action.description: list_events (list calendar events), get_event (get event details by ID), create_event (create a new event), update_event (update an existing event), delete_event (delete an event), list_calendars (list available calendars), search_events (search events by text)

eventId.description: Event ID. Required for get_event, update_event, and delete_event.

summary.description: Event summary/title (max 500 chars). Required for create_event.

start.description: Start time in ISO 8601 format. Required for create_event.

end.description: End time in ISO 8601 format. Required for create_event.

attendees.description: Array of attendee email strings. Optional.

query.description: Search query text (max 200 chars). Required for search_events.

timeMin.description: Minimum time filter in ISO 8601 format. Optional for list_events.

timeMax.description: Maximum time filter in ISO 8601 format. Optional for list_events.

limit.description: Number of results to return (1-100, default 25).
